headline: Nike Uses Lab, Innovation to Fuel Turnaround
summary: Kevin McCarthy, Neuberger Berman Senior Research Analyst, says Nike's cross-functional team restructuring was aimed not only at driving revenue but also at improving profitability. He speaks with Romaine Bostick on "The Close."

raw.headline: Nike Uses Lab, Innovation to Fuel Turnaround
raw.summary: Kevin McCarthy, Neuberger Berman Senior Research Analyst, says Nike's cross-functional team restructuring was aimed not only at driving revenue but also at improving profitability. He speaks with Romaine Bostick on "The Close."

headline: How the NIKE-SKIMS Partnership Could Spark NKE's Next Growth Wave?
summary: NKE's bold collaboration with SKIMS fuses sport and style, aiming to refresh its women's segment and reignite brand momentum.

headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights lululemon athletica, NIKE and Under Armour

headline: Nike Answers Lack of Innovation Criticism With Four New Product Reveals
summary: The company unveiled a thermal regulation jacket, a soccer jersey with more airflow, neuroscience-based shoes and sneakers with motors.
